Front: What is the name of your judo organization?

Back: Ichi, ni, san, shi, go, roku, shichi, hachi, ku, ju

Front: Name the three parts of unarmed combat in English and Japanese
Back: Throwing techniques (Nage waza), grappling techniques (Katame waza), and striking techniques (Atemi waza)
